short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover and get in the know-all about slang!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever tuned into Twitch for some live entertainment but had no idea what the people in the chat are saying? 

Or have you ever got sent a message on MS Teams at work from a cool colleague but had no clue as to what the colleague was trying to say? 

Or have you ever just wanted to endless browser through the internet for a fun time while you procrastinate?

If so, try Urban Dictionary Adventure and be able to easily search for slang/phrases anywhere on Google Chrome! 

Simply highlight some text, right click and start your discovery through the context menu onto Urban Dictionary to check out its meaning!


















_________________________
Urban Dictionary Adventure is in no way affiliated with Urban Dictionary and urbandictionary.com.
